default-bj-bet.description: The default bet to use if no bet is given in blackjack

bj-screen.description: The screen to use for blackjack, {amount} will be replaced with the amount won

money-format.description:
The text to send when someone checks your balance with [money
 {amount} will be replaced with the amount of money you have

pingresponse.description: When you are pinged the bot will say this (none by default)

heist-join.description: What is said when you join a heist

lottery-win.description:
The text that is said when you get a winning ticket from [ticket
  • {numbers} will be replaced with the winning numbers
  • {amount} will be replaced with the amount you won

count-text.description:
The text to send when running [count
 count will be replaced with the current number ({count} by default)

change-cmd-return.description: When something is sent to chat with the RETURN status, say this instead

change-cmd-info.description: When something is sent to chat with the INFO status, say this instead

change-cmd-prompt.description: When something is sent to chat with the PROMPT status, say this instead

change-cmd-warning.description: When something is sent to chat with the WARNING status, say this instead

change-cmd-error.description: When something is sent to chat with the ERROR status, say this instead

dm-when-online.description: The text to send to dms when the bot comes online

currency-sign.description: The symbol to use for your currency ('[' by default)

puffle-find.description:
The text that is said when your puffle pet finds something
  • {name} will be replaced with your puffle's name
  • {stuff} will be replaced with what the puffle finds

enable-mail.description: Whether or not to enable the [mail command (true/false)

mail-signature.description: The text to append when you send mail to someone

no-pingresponse.description: When pinging someone, do not show their pingresponse if they have one (default false)

pipe-symbol.description: The symbol to use for piping commands (>pipe> by default)

1-arg-string.description: Whether or not quoting text will count it as 1 argument (false by default)

warn-cmds.description: A list of commands that when you run, will confirm that you want to run them (none by default)

connect4-win.description: The text to send when you win connect4

warn-categories.description: A list of categories that if a command belongs to, will warn you (none by default)

error-on-no-cmd.description: Set to false so that the bot doesnt say `{cmd} does not exist`

opts-parser.description: There are 3 opts parsers, normal, with-negate, and unix, with-negate allows for +opt which sets opt to false, unix allows for more traditional unix option parsing

css.description: Custom css to use on the website
